content.rendered:
Naace is a professional association of community of educators, technologists and policy makers who share a vision for the role of technology in advancing education. Its members include teachers, school leaders, advisors and consultants working within and across all phases of UK education. Naace represents the voice of the UK education technology community in the schools sector at a national and international level, organises conferences and courses and, as a contribution to professional development, disseminates resources, research and reflection. A dedicated team of permanent staff is based in Nottingham to support the Association’s activities.

www.naace.co.uk
